classConstructor.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props as arguments

classConstructorContext.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props and context as arguments

componentDidMount.description: Invoked once, only on the client (not on the server), immediately after the initial rendering occurs.

componentDidUpdate.description: Invoked immediately after the component's updates are flushed to the DOM.

componentGetDerivedStateFromProps.description: Invoked after a component is instantiated as well as when it receives new props. It should return an object to update state, or null to indicate that the new props do not require any state updates.

componentRender.description: When called, it should examine this.props and this.state and return a single child element.

componentSetStateFunc.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

componentSetStateObject.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

componentWillMount.description: Invoked once, both on the client and server, immediately before the initial rendering occurs

componentWillReceiveProps.description: Invoked when a component is receiving new props. This method is not called for the initial render.

componentWillUnmount.description: Invoked immediately before a component is unmounted from the DOM.

componentWillUpdate.description: Invoked immediately before rendering when new props or state are being received.

createReactHookWithName.description: Create React Hook using File name

propTypeArrayOf.description: An array of a certain type

propTypeArrayOfRequired.description: An array of a certain type required

propTypeEnum.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum

propTypeEnumRequired.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum required

propTypeInstanceOf.description: Is an instance of a class prop type

propTypeInstanceOfRequired.description: Is an instance of a class prop type required

propTypeNode.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array

propTypeNodeRequired.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array required

propTypeObjectOf.description: An object with property values of a certain type

propTypeObjectOfRequired.description: An object with property values of a certain type required

propTypeOneOfType.description: An object that could be one of many types

propTypeOneOfTypeRequired.description: An object that could be one of many types required

propTypeShape.description: An object taking on a particular shape

propTypeShapeRequired.description: An object taking on a particular shape required

reactClassComponentPropTypes.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes

reactClassComponentWithMethods.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes and all lifecycle methods

reactFunctionComponent.description: Creates a React functional component without PropTypes

reactFunctionComponentWithEmotion.description: Creates a React functional component with emotion import

shouldComponentUpdate.description: Invoked before rendering when new props or state are being received.

useEffect with cleanup.description: React useEffect() hook with a cleanup function
